title: Screen Share doesn't work on first time (blurry picture), but it works on second time
body:
**Describe the bug**
When I share my screen, person on other side only gets blurry picture. If I cancel "share" and try again picture is ok. It doesn't happen always (sometimes people on other side see picture on first try).

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Start screen sharing

**Expected behavior**
Person on other side can see my screen.

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Ubuntu 24.04.1 LTS
 - Installation package:  deb
 - Version: 1.10.2
